name: Atlantic Mackerel
description: A fast-swimming, schooling fish with a streamlined body and iridescent blue-green back. Known for its rich, oily flesh.
bait: Small lures, feathers, or baitfish like anchovies.

name: Rainbow Trout
description: A freshwater fish with a distinctive pink-red stripe along its side. Popular among anglers for its fighting spirit.

name: Yellowfin Tuna
description: A large, fast oceanic fish with bright yellow fins. Prized for its firm, flavorful meat in sushi and sashimi.
bait: Live bait (sardines, mackerel), poppers, or trolling lures.

name: Atlantic Cod
description: A bottom-dwelling fish with a mild, white flesh. Historically significant in global fisheries.
